TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RefreshMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether property changes made to objects tracked by Object Services are kept or replaced with property values from the data source.

remarks.format:
## Examples [Saving Changes and Managing Concurrency](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb738618(v=vs.110).aspx)
[How to: Manage Data Concurrency in the Object Context](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/bb399228(v=vs.110).aspx)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode ClientWins = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Property changes made to objects in the object context are not replaced with values from the data source. On the next call to , these changes are sent to the data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Objects.RefreshMode StoreWins = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Property changes made to objects in the object context are replaced with values from the data source.
